messages:
Name: Irfan Can Kahveci
Nationality: Turkey
Date of Birth: July 15, 1995
Position: Midfielder
Current club: Fenerbahçe
Süper Lig clubs played for: Gençlerbirliği, İstanbul Başakşehir, Fenerbahçe

Irfan Can Kahveci is a Fenerbahçe midfielder who has made 30 appearances in this season's Süper Lig, with 12 of these coming for his current club. He had previously played for İstanbul Başakşehir in the competition during 2020/2021.

The last league game that Kahveci played came on May 11 for Fenerbahçe against Sivasspor; a meeting that he played only nine minutes in during a 2-1 defeat. In total, the midfielder has notched two Süper Lig goals this term, and chipped in with three assists. He has been booked five times, as well as sent off twice.
It was versus Antalyaspor on October 24 when Kahveci last scored, netting in a 5-1 win. His opening goal of the campaign came in the 2-0 victory against Trabzonspor on October 17.
Last season for İstanbul Başakşehir, Kahveci made 29 Süper Lig appearances, scored four goals and provided five assists.
Prior to joining Fenerbahçe in January 2021, Kahveci made 116 league appearances in total at İstanbul Başakşehir, scoring 12 goals and providing 12 assists.
